statements: SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT id, timestamp, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE machine_id = 1;
SELECT energy_consumed, timestamp FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT machine_id, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY machine_id;
SELECT id, machine_id, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_consumed > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT machine_id, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY machine_id HAVING total_energy_consumed > 5000 ORDER BY total_energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE machine_id = 3 AND energy_consumed < 500 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, timestamp, ROUND(energy_consumed/1000, 2) AS energy_consumed_kwh FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT AVG(energy_consumed) AS avg_energy_consumed, COUNT(*) AS records_count FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE machine_id IN (1, 2, 4);
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption WHERE device_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE production_line_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_name, location, production_line_id FROM devices WHERE device_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT energy_consumed, energy_cost FROM energy_consumption WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY energy_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_name, location, energy_consumed FROM devices WHERE location = 'Warehouse' AND energy_consumed > 100 ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC;

SELECT device_name, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM devices JOIN energy_consumption ON devices.device_id = energy_consumption.device_id GROUP BY device_name ORDER BY total_energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT device_name, location, timestamp FROM devices JOIN energy_consumption ON devices.device_id = energy_consumption.device_id WHERE energy_cost > 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;

SELECT device_name, location, production_line_id, energy_consumed, energy_cost FROM devices JOIN energy_consumption ON devices.device_id = energy_consumption.device_id WHERE production_line_id = 3 AND energy_consumed BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY energy_cost DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE device_id = 123;
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices WHERE manufacturer = 'Samsung';
SELECT id, timestamp, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT manufacturer_name, country FROM manufacturers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT device_name, location, date_installed FROM devices WHERE device_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices WHERE manufacturer='ABC Manufacturing'
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_consumed > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp LIMIT 5
SELECT manufacturer_name, country FROM manufacturers WHERE country='USA'
SELECT device_name, device_id, location FROM devices WHERE date_installed > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY device_name
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT id, timestamp FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE energy_usage > 100;
SELECT line_name, manager_id FROM ProductionLine WHERE line_id = 1;
SELECT machine_name, status FROM ProductionMachine WHERE line_id = 2 ORDER BY machine_name DESC;
SELECT name, department_id FROM Employee WHERE manager_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT energy_usage, timestamp FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE energy_usage > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT line_id, line_name, manager_id FROM ProductionLine WHERE manager_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT machine_name, status FROM ProductionMachine WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY machine_id ASC;
SELECT id, name, department_id, manager_id FROM Employee WHERE department_id = 1 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionRecords ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT machine_name, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionRecords JOIN Machines ON EnergyConsumptionRecords.machine_id = Machines.machine_id;
SELECT department_name, location FROM Departments JOIN Machines ON Departments.department_id = Machines.machine_id ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM Employees WHERE department_id = 1;
SELECT AVG(cost_per_kwh) AS average_cost_per_kwh FROM EnergyCost;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionRecords ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT machine_id, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionRecords GROUP BY machine_id HAVING total_energy_consumed > 1000 ORDER BY total_energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, d.department_name FROM Employees e INNER JOIN Departments d ON e.department_id = d.department_id WHERE d.supervisor = 'John Doe';
SELECT machine_name, SUM(energy_consumed * cost_per_kwh) AS energy_cost FROM Machines m INNER JOIN EnergyCost ec ON DATE(timestamp) = date GROUP BY machine_name ORDER BY energy_cost DESC;

SELECT machine_name, location, department_name FROM Machines m INNER JOIN Departments d ON m.department = d.department_name WHERE department_id IN (SELECT department_id FROM Employees WHERE first_name = 'Alice') ORDER BY location, machine_name ASC;
